The camel-jpa component will join transaction by default._You can use this option to turn this off, for example if you use LOCAL_RESOURCE and join transaction_doesn't work with your JPA provider. This option can also be set globally on the JpaComponent,_instead of having to set it on all endpoints.
codeText: public void setJoinTransaction(boolean joinTransaction) {_        this.joinTransaction = joinTransaction__    }
